thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: It’s Getting Harder to List Exotic ETFs

author: Ari I. Weinberg
title: It’s Getting Harder to List Exotic ETFs
text:
After years of unbridled growth, the introduction of new ETFs and other exchange-traded products has run into hurdles recently from both regulators and forces within the securities industry.
The most significant line in the sand drawn recently by regulators was a Jan. 18 letter from Dalia Blass, head of investment management for the Securities and Exchange Commission, regarding applications and listings for bitcoin-linked exchange-traded products (ETPs). The letter prompted withdrawals of several applications for bitcoin ETFs.
...
